item.description: Tonight we will watch the fascinating documentary, Being in the World, celebrating human beings, and our ability, through the mastery of physical, intellectual and creative skills, to find meaning in the world around us. This film takes us on a gripping and surprising journey around the world meeting extraordinary people, showing how we go from following rules to proficiency, to becoming masters in the form artists, craftsmen, athletes, and, ultimately, unique human beings attuned to the sacred. The film also interviews several world renowned philosophers, exploring what makes being human precious. Afterwards, we will have a group discussion on the film looking through an Integral lens. (I highly recommend that the Integral community come out for this one! We will start promptly at 7:15 pm.)
item.name: Being Human in the Technological Age
